original_text: Now the house was full of men and women. All the lords of the Philistines were there, and on the roof there were about 3,000 men and women, who looked on while Samson entertained.
korean_text: 그 집에는 남녀가 가득하니 블레셋 모든 방백들도 거기에 있고 지붕에 있는 남녀도 삼천 명 가량이라 다 삼손이 재주 부리는 것을 보더라

sentences.original_text: Now the house was full of men and women.
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그 집은 남자들과 여자들로 가득 차 있었습니다.

sentences.original_text: All the lords of the Philistines were there
and on the roof there were about 3,000 men and women
sentences.korean_translation: 지붕 위에는 약 3,000명의 남자와 여자가 있었는데,

sentences.original_text: who looked on while Samson entertained.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 삼손이 희롱하는 동안 구경하고 있었습니다.
